name: Play Boxing Games 2018
description:
Fight fight fight, you are the best fight king.
Whether you like wrestling games or fighting games you cant ignore boxing games.

Download this fight games and start your boxing legend at this night, be a hero and win the night champion in the final. Show your skills in tournaments and knockout to prove you are the best boxing king fighter, the best fighting master.

Fighting Game Feature
-Amazing 3d animations and sound effects.
- Whole new fighting arenas
- Two Game modes. Levels and knockout added.
-Realistic scene in this game including ring, timer, bell and clock.
-Easy to control, attacks and fight back and Movements.
